title: The Open Citations Corpus
description: The Open Citations Corpus (OCC) is an open access repository of scholarly citation data, information about the author-created bibliographic references present in scholarly publications that cite other scholarly publications.
subject: scholarly_communication
bibliographic_database
open_access

distribution.title: The Open Citations Corpus: distribution in Turtle dated 3rd April 2016
distribution.description: The distribution of the Open Citations Corpus (OCC) stored in Turtle dated 3rd April 2016.

subset.title: The Open Citations Corpus: Bibliographic Resource dataset
subset.description: The Bibliographic Resource dataset of the Open Citations Corpus (OCC) contains all the data related to any bibliograhic resource (articles, journals, proceedings papers, etc.) that has been included in the corpus.
subject: scholarly_communication
bibliographic_database
open_access
